V03vinv15_u:4_0: Old monks are entitled to veneration
V03vinv15_u:5_0: buddho bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme;
V03vinv15_u:5_1: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulānāṃ upasthānaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:5_2_0: ko 'smābhir āyuṣmantaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayaitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ? kasya cāsmābhir abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāṃjalisāmīcīkarma
V03vinv15_u:5_2_1: kartavyam? ko 'smākam arhati agrāsanam agrodakam agrapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhoktum iti? tatraike evam āhuḥ śākyaḥ pravrajita iti;
V03vinv15_u:5_3: anye tv evam āhuḥ yo brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajita iti;
V03vinv15_u:5_9_0: apare yo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kalyāṇavākyo vākkaraṇenopeto jñāto mahāpuṇyaḥ sūtradharo vinayadharo mātṛkādharo
V03vinv15_u:5_9_1: bahuśruto dhārmakathikaḥ sthaviro rājanyaḥ āraṇyakaḥ traicīvariko nāmatikaḥ pāṃsukulikaḥ piṇḍapātikaḥ ekāsanikaḥ khalupaścādbhaktiko
V03vinv15_u:5_9_2: vṛkṣamūlikaḥ śmāśāniko 'bhyavakāśikaḥ naiṣadiko yathāsaṃstariko yo lābhī anityasaṃjñāyāḥ pūrvavad yāvad yo 'rhann aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyīti;
V03vinv15_u:5_10: apare evam āhuḥ sarveṣām asmākam āyuṣmanto na sameti yaduta nānāprajñaptyā;
V03vinv15_u:5_13: yathāsmākaṃ sa bhagavān vyākariṣyati tathainaṃ dhārayiṣyāma iti
V03vinv15_u:5_14: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:5_15: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:5_16: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan;
V03vinv15_u:5_17: ihāsmakaṃ [Śay-v_4] bhadanta saṃbahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upasthānaśālāyaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:5_18: pūrvavad yāvad yathāsmākaṃ bhagavān vyākariṣyati tathainaṃ dhārayiṣyāma iti;
V03vinv15_u:5_19: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ patipṛcchāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:5_20: ko 'smābhiḥ (MSV III 123) satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ? pūrvavad yāvad agrapiṇḍapātam paribhoktum iti;
V03vinv15_u:5_21: bhagavān āha: vṛddhatarako yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:5_23: sa ca yuṣmākam arhaty agrāsanam agrodakam agrapiṇḍapātam paribhkotum iti
V03vinv15_u:5_24: uktaṃ bhagavatā: vṛddhatarako bhikṣur yuṣmābhiḥ satkartavyah;
V03vinv15_u:7_0: Old house-holders, etc., are not entitled to veneration
V03vinv15_u:8_0: bhikṣavaḥ āgārikān vṛddhān satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_3: kathaṃ yūyam asmākaṃ satkurvatha? etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_4: bhagvān āha: pravrajitān bhikṣavo mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tv āgarikān iti
V03vinv15_u:8_5: bhikṣavaḥ anyatīrthikān vṛddhān dṛṣṭvā satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_6: bhagavān āha; iha dhārmikān mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tu bāhyakān iti
V03vinv15_u:8_7: te śrāmaṇerakān vṛddhapravrajitān dṛṣṭvā satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_8: bhagavān āha: upasaṃpannān bhikṣavo mayā sandhāyoktaṃ no tu śrāmaṇerakān iti
V03vinv15_u:8_9: te navopasaṃpannān vṛddhān satkurvani gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_10: bhagavān āha: anyonyaṃ varṣāgraṃ pṛṣṭvā vanditavyaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:8_14: (MSV III 124) bhagavān āha; sāmayikam ārocayitavyam; bhikṣavo na jānate kati sāmayikānīti;
V03vinv15_u:8_15: bhagabān āha: paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ samayāḥ, haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ mṛtavārṣikaṃ dīrghavārṣikam iti;
V03vinv15_u:8_17: graiṣmikaṃ catvāro māsāḥ; ḥvārṣikam eko māsaḥḥ; mṛtavārṣikam ekaṃ rātrindivasam;
V03vinv15_u:8_19: ity evaṃ sāmayikam ārocayitvā yaḥ pūrvopasaṃpannaḥ sa vanditavyaḥ
V03vinv15_u:8_21: katame catvāro vandyāḥ? sadevakasya [Śay-v_5] tāval lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyās tathāgatārhatsamyaksaṃbuddho vandyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:8_23: sarveṣām upasaṃpannānāṃ pūrvopasaṃpannā vandyāḥ [A_315a] sthāpayitvā bhikṣuṇīm;
V03vinv15_u:8_24: tasyā varṣaśatopasaṃpannāyā api tadahaḥ upasaṃpanno bhikṣur vandyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:8_26_0: daśāvandyāḥ; katame ḥdaśa?ḥ pārivāsiko mūlapārivāsikaḥ paryuṣitaparivāsaḥ mānāpyacārikaś caritamānāpyo 'darśanāyotkṣiptakaḥ
V03vinv15_u:8_26_1: apratikarmāyotkṣiptakaḥ apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣiptakaḥ sarvo gṛhī ḥsarvāśḥ cānupasaṃpannaḥ
V03vinv15_u:8_27: yadā bhagavatā yathāvṛddhikayā prajñaptās tadā bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_28: te 'nyonyaṃ satkurvvanto ḥgurukurvantoḥ mānayantaḥ pūjayanto vardhante kuśalair dharmair utpalaṃ vā (MSV III 125) yathodake
V03vinv15_u:8_29: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:8_30: paśya bhadanta yadā bhagavatā yathāvṛddhikayā prajñaptās tadā bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti;
V03vinv15_u:8_31: te 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūjayanto vardhante kuśalair dharmair utpalaṃ vā yathodake iti;
V03vinv15_u:8_32_0: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣavaḥ āścaryaṃ yad idānīm mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv15_u:8_32_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ
V03vinv15_u:8_32_2: satkurvanti gurukurvanti pūrvavad yāvad utpalaṃ vā yathodake iti;
V03vinv15_u:8_33_0: yat tu mayā sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair vinipatitaśarīreṇa
V03vinv15_u:8_33_1: yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya sakalo jambūdvīpanivāsī janakāyo yadbhūyasā praṇīte trayastriṃśe devanikāye
V03vinv15_u:10_0: The story of the francoline, the hare, the monkey and the elephant
V03vinv15_u:11_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśīṣu janapade anyatamasmin vanagahane catvāraḥ prāṇinaḥ prativasanti kapiñjalaḥ śaśo markaṭo gajaś [Śay-v_6] ca;
V03vinv15_u:11_1: te ca parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānā aśaṃkino yatheṣṭavihāratayā kālam atināmayanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_2: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ buddhir utpannā;
V03vinv15_u:11_3: (MSV III 126) asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_4: kin tu na jānīmaḥ ko 'smābhiḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_5: yan nu vayaṃ yathāvṛddhikāṃ prajñapayema iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_6: te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhā iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_7: ko 'smākaṃ vṛddha iti; tataḥ kapiṃjalena vaṭavṛkṣo darśitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_8: bhavantaḥ eṣa vaṭavṛkṣaḥ kena kiyatpramāṇo dṛṣṭa iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_9: hastī kathayati; mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo matpramāṇa eva uccatveneti;
V03vinv15_u:11_10: markaṭaḥ kathayati; mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo mama tulya evoccatveneti;
V03vinv15_u:11_11: te kathayanti; tvam asya vṛddha iti; śaśaḥ kathayati; mayāpy asya dvipatrakasya patreṣv evāvaśyayanbindavo jihvayā nirlīḍhā iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_12: te kathayanti: tvam apy anayor vṛddha iti; kapiñjalaḥ kathayati; paśyata yūyam enaṃ vaṭavṛkṣaṃ mahatpramāṇākāram;
V03vinv15_u:11_13: te kathayanti: paśyāmaḥ; etasmān mayā phalāni bhakṣayitvāsmin pradeśe uccāraḥ kṛtas tasmād ayaṃ jāta iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_14: [A_315b] te kathayanti: yady evaṃ tvam asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ vṛddha iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_17: śāśaḥ kapiṃjalam eva; te evaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā satkurvantas tasmin vanagahane itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_18: yadā viṣamanimnāḥ pradeśā gantavyā bhavanti tadā hastinaṃ markaṭo 'bhirohati markaṭam śaśaḥ śaśam api kapiṃjalaḥ
V03vinv15_u:11_19: teṣām evaṃ pravṛddhasnehānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ ca buddhir utpannā;
V03vinv15_u:11_20: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ pravṛddhasnehāḥ sagauravāś ca;
V03vinv15_u:11_21: anyad api (MSV III 127) tāvat kiṃcit kuśalaṃ samādāya vartema iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_22: kiṃ kurmaḥ; kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati; prāṇātipātāt prativiramāmaḥ; kīdṛṣo 'smākaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ? kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:11_24: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa saprāṇakāni parityajya niṣprāṇakāni;
V03vinv15_u:11_25: paribhoktavyāni; te saprāṇakāni parityajya niṣprāṇakāni paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:11_26: teṣām etad abhavat; asti vayaṃ prāṇātipātāt prativiratā no tv adattādānāt prativiramāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_29: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa saparigrahāṇi parityajya niṣparigrahāṇi [Śay-v_7] paribhoktavyāni;
V03vinv15_u:11_30: te saparigrahāṇi parityajya niṣparigrahāṇi paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:11_31: teṣām etad abhavat; asti vayam adattādānāt prativiratāḥ no tu kāmamithyācārāt;
V03vinv15_u:11_34: vayam gamyā api gacchāmaḥ; agamyā api gacchāmaḥ; tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa gamyaiva gantavyā nāgamyā te gamyāṃ gacchanti nāgamyām.
V03vinv15_u:11_35: teṣām etad abhavat: asti vayaṃ kāmamithyācārāt prativiratāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_36: no tu mṛṣāvādāt; yan nu vayaṃ mṛṣāvādāt prativiramāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_39: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa na yadvā tadvā vipralapitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:11_40: (MSV III 128) vicārya vicārya kāle vāg udīrayitavyā;
V03vinv15_u:11_41: te na yadvā tadvā vipralapanti kiṃ tu vicārya vicārya kālena vācam udīrayanti
V03vinv15_u:11_42: teṣām etad abhavat; asti vayaṃ mṛṣāvādāt prativiratāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_47: tad asmābhir adyāgreṇa mādanīyāni phalāni parityajyamādanīyāni phalāni paribhoktavyāni;
V03vinv15_u:11_48: te mādanīyāni phalāni parityajyamādanīyāni phalāni paribhoktum ārabdhāḥ
V03vinv15_u:11_49: yadā te pañcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:11_50: asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_51: yan nu vayam anyān api paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_52: te kathayanti: evaṃ kurmaḥ; ko yuṣmākaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati? markaṭaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:11_54: tataḥ śaśaḥ kathayati: ahaṃ sarvān śaśān lomaśān mṛgāṃś ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:11_55: [A_316a] hastī kathayati: ahaṃ sarvān hastinaḥ siṃhān vyāghradvīpinaś ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:11_56: kapiṃjalaḥ kathayati: yady evam etat saṃkṣepād yuṣmākam avinayā apadā dvipadāś catuṣpadāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca tān ahaṃ sarvān paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti [Śay-v_8]
V03vinv15_u:11_57: tatas te kāśīviṣaye (MSV III 129) yāvattiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinas te sarve paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_58: te anyonyam avyābādhamānās tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe saṃprajānadvihāriṇo yatheṣṭaṃ viharanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_60: sadā puṣpaphalā vṛkṣāḥ, śasyavatī vasumatī; te manuṣyair dṛṣṭā anyonyam avyābādhamānā viharantaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:11_61: sadā puṣpaphalā vṛkṣāḥ, śasyavatī vasumatī; rājā kathayati: ahaṃ dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayāmi mamaiṣo 'nubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_62: antaḥpuraṃ kumārāmātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadāś ca ḥkathayanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_63: asmākam eṣo 'nubhāvaḥḥ; rājā saṃlakṣayati; sarva ete kathayanti mamānubhāvo mamānubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_66: tair api na jñātam; yāvad vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre udyānam;
V03vinv15_u:11_67: tatra pañcābhijña riṣiḥ prativasati sakalasya vārāṇasīnivāsino janakāyasya pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca;
V03vinv15_u:11_68: tato rājā tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:11_69: maharṣe mama vijite yāvattityagyonigatāḥ prāṇinas te sarve anyonyam avyābādhamānāḥ saṃprajānadvihāriṇo yatheṣṭaṃ viharanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_70: devaḥ kālavarṣī sadā puṣpaphalā vṛkṣāḥ śasyavatī ca vasumatī;
V03vinv15_u:11_71: tasmān mamaitad abhavat: ahaṃ dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:11_72: mamaiso 'nubhāva iti; antaḥpuraṃ kumārāmātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadāś ca saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv15_u:11_73: asmākam eṣo 'nuhāva iti; tan na jñāyate kasyāyam anubhāva iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_74: kautukaś ca me mahān; tvam arhasi saṃśayaṃ chettum;
V03vinv15_u:11_75: kasyāyam anubhāva iti; sa kathayati: mahārāja ma tavaiṣo 'nubhāvo nāntaḥpurasya na kumārāṇāṃ nāmātyānāṃ na bhaṭabalāgrasya na (MSV IV 130) naigamajānapadānaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:11_76: api tu tava vijite catvāraḥ prāniṇaḥ prativasanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_77: teṣām ayam anubhāva tit; rājā kathayati: gacchāmi tān paśyamīti; ṛṣiḥ kathayati: mahārāja kiṃ tava tair dṛṣṭair api tu yat te samādāya vartante tat samādāya vartasveti;
V03vinv15_u:11_79: maharṣe kidṛśāni pañca vratapadāni? mahārāja te prāṇinaṃ jīvitān na vyavaropayanti;
V03vinv15_u:11_80_0: parasvaṃ nāpaharanti; agamyāgamanaṃ na kurvanti; mṛṣāvādaṃ na bhāṣante; madyapānaṃ ca nādhyācaranti; rājā kathayati: maharṣe
V03vinv15_u:11_80_1: yady evaṃ aham apy etāni pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartema;
V03vinv15_u:11_81: atha sa rājā pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_82: rājā pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartata iti devyo 'pi pañaca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_83: kumārā amātyā bhaṭabalāgraṃ naigamajānapadā api pañca vratapadāni samādaya vartitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv15_u:11_85: rājā brahmadattaḥ pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartate sārdham antaḥpureṇa kumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadair iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_86: śrutvā ca punas te 'pi pañcavratapadāni [A_316b] samādaya vartitum ārabdhāḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa kumārair amātyair bhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadair iti;
V03vinv15_u:11_87: bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyaḥ pañca vratapadāni samādāya vartitum ārabdhaḥ
V03vinv15_u:11_88: tena khalu samayena jambūdvīpe yaḥ kālaṃ karoti sa kāyasya bhedāt praṇīteṣu deveṣū trayastriṃśeṣūpapadyate;
V03vinv15_u:11_89: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ āpūryamāṇaṃ devaparṣadaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar gāthāṃ bhāṣate;
V03vinv15_u:11_92: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau kapiṃjalaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv15_u:11_93: śaśaḥ śāriputro bhikṣur markaṭo maudgalyāyano bhikṣur gaja ānandaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_94: tadāpi mayā yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya sakalo jambūdvīpanivāsī janakāyo bhūyasā trayastriṃśe devanikāye upapannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:11_95: etarhy api mayā yathāvṛddhikāyāṃ prajñaptāyāṃ yathāvṛddhikām āgamya bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūyayanto vardhante kuśalair dharmair utpalaṃ vā yathodake
V03vinv15_u:13_0: The Buddha eulogises the order by age
V03vinv15_u:14_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sagauravā viharata sapratīṣāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sabrahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu;
V03vinv15_u:14_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣur agauravo viharann apratīśaḥ abhayavaśavartī sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_2: āsamudācārikān dharmān aparipūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_3: śaikṣān dharmān aparipūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_4: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham aparipūryānupādāya [Śay-v_10] parinirvāsyati nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_5_0: sa tāvad bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ sagauravo viharan sapratīśaḥ sabhayavaśavartī brahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu āsamudācārikān
V03vinv15_u:14_5_1: dharmān pūrayiṣyati (MSV III 132) sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_6: āsamudācārikān dharmān paripūrya śaikṣān dharmān paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_7: śaikṣān dharmān paripūrya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūrayiṣyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_8: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ paripūryānupādāya parinirvāsyati sthānam etad vidyate;
V03vinv15_u:14_10: yat sagauravā vihariṣyāmaḥ sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ ḥsabrahmacāriṣūḥ sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu:
V03vinv15_u:17_0: yadā bhagavatā pañcakā vinītās te araṇye prativasanti;
V03vinv15_u:17_1: te araṇye prativasanto āgamyā bhavanti siṃhānāṃ vyāghrāṇāṃ dvīpināṃ tarakṣūṇām
V03vinv15_u:17_2: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: kutra pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakā āvāsaṃ kalpitavantaḥ? paśyati vihāre;
V03vinv15_u:17_4: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ kalayāṇabhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv15_u:17_6: aho batāhaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇaṃ vihāraṃ kārayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:17_7: sa kālyam evotthāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:17_8: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau [A_317a] śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:17_9: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kalyāṇabhadrikaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv15_u:17_10: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarṣya (MSV III 133) samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv15_u:17_11: atha kalyāṇabhadriko gṛhapatir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam ieam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:17_12: yadi bhagavān anujānīyād ahaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāraṃ karayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:17_13: bhagavān āha; tasmād gṛhapate anujānāmi kāraya iti;
V03vinv15_u:17_14: sa na jānīte kīdṛśaḥ kārayitavya iti;
V03vinv15_u:17_15: bhagavān āha: yadi trilayanaṃ kārayasi madhye gandhakuṭiḥ kārayitavyā dvayoḥ pārśvayor dve layane;
V03vinv15_u:17_16: evaṃ triṣāle nava layanāni; catuḥśāle madhye dvārakoṣṭhakābhimukhaṃ [Śay-v_11] gandhakuṭiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:17_18: sa na jānīte kati purāḥ kartavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:17_19: bhagavān āha: bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcapurā vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ saptapurā gandhakuṭiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:17_20: saptapūrā bālāgrapotikāḥ; bhikṣūṇīnāṃ tu tripurā vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:19_0: The story of Anāthapiṇḍada: his birth and wonders
V03vinv15_u:20_0: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ datto nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv15_u:20_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:20_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya (MSV III 134) paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv15_u:20_4: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv15_u:20_5: dārako jātaḥ; tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv15_u:20_7: jñātaya ūcuḥ: ayaṃ dārako dattasya gṛhapateḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sudatta iti nāmeti;
V03vinv15_u:20_10_0: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyām; dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām; dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyām; dvābhyāṃ krīḍanakābhyām; so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir
V03vinv15_u:20_10_1: unnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham
V03vinv15_u:20_11: so 'pareṇa samayena sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito dhātryaṃsagato niṣaṇṇo bahirnirgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_13: kumārāham alaṃkāreṇārthī; prayaccha me alaṃkāram iti; tena pramuditamanasā asāv alaṃkāro dattaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_14: sa gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ; pitrā cāsya dhātrī pṛṣṭā; kutra kumārasyālaṃkāra iti; sā kathayati: dattaḥ kumāreṇa [Śay-v_12] yācanakāyeti;
V03vinv15_u:20_16: so 'pi dattaḥ; bhūyo 'py alaṃkṛtaḥ; so 'pi tena dattaḥ; sa gṛhapatiḥ patnīm āmantrayate:
V03vinv15_u:20_18: nityaṃ dānābhirata iti; sā kathayati: āryaputra yady evaṃ nainaṃ bhūyo 'py alaṃkariṣyāmi;
V03vinv15_u:20_19: sa kathayati: bhadre asty asmākaṃ suvarṇam aprameyaṃ ratnāni ca;
V03vinv15_u:20_22: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatir bhṛtyajanaparivṛto (MSV III 135) nadīm ajīravatīṃ snātuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_23: sudatto dārakaḥ kathayati: tāta aham api gacchāmīti; sa taṃ vipralambhayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_25: nadī grāhākulā; iyaṃ te dhātrī snāpayiṣyatīti;
V03vinv15_u:20_26: sa rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ; mātāsya kathayati: āryaputra kimartham ayaṃ dārako rautīti;
V03vinv15_u:20_28: sā kathayati: āryaputra tvayā sārdhaṃ gacchatu;
V03vinv15_u:20_29: ko 'tra virodhaḥ; sutarāṃ gupto bhaviṣyatīti; sa tam ādāya nadīṃ gataḥ; snāpayitvā kule sthāpitaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:20_30: tāta kimarthaṃ mama rakṣā kriyate? putra tava doṣo 'sti;
V03vinv15_u:20_32: kiṃ tāto dravyeṇārthī? putra ko 'nārthī? tāta yady evam avatāraya mām;
V03vinv15_u:20_33: sa tenāvatāritaḥ; tatas tenobhau pāṇī nadyām āplāvya suvarṇapūrṇās catvāro lohasaṃghāṭā uddhṛtāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_34: kathayati: tāta atas tnaṃ yāvadāptaḥṃḥ dhanena dhanakāryaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭam atraiva plāvaya;
V03vinv15_u:20_35: putra kiṃ tvaṃ jalagatān nidhīn paśyasi? tāta na kevalaṃ jalagatān sthalagatān api sasvāmikān asvāmikān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
V03vinv15_u:20_37: śakyam evaṃvidhena dānaptinā dānaṃ dātum iti viditvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:20_38: putra yady evaṃ dehi dānaṃ yatheṣṭam iti;
V03vinv15_u:20_39: dharmatā hy eṣā: na tāvat putro yaśasvī bhavati yāvad asya pitā jīvatīti
V03vinv15_u:20_40: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_41: sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvṛttaḥ; satatam anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchatīti samantāc chadbo visṛtaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:20_42: dattasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvrṭtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_44: tasyānāthapiṇḍado (MSV III 136) gṛhapatir iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv15_u:20_45: tatas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānitaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:20_46: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:20_47: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_49: tena ṣaṇṇāṃ niveśaḥ kṛtaḥ; saptamaḥ sujāto nāmnā; tasya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ samanveṣate;
V03vinv15_u:20_50: na ārāgayati; sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāpro vyavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_53: sa kathayati: kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti;
V03vinv15_u:20_54: sa kathayati: mayā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ niveśaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_55: saptamasya sujātasya sadṛśakulaṃ cintayāmi katarat tat kulaṃ yato 'sya niveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:20_56: sa kathayati: alpotsukas tiṣṭha aham asya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ gaveṣayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:20_59: evaṃ kuru; sa rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ; rājagṛhe anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo 'nāthapiṇḍadasya pratirūpaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_60: sa tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo dvāraśālāyāṃ sthitvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:20_61: svasti svastīti; tasya gṛhajanāḥ kathayanti: brāhmaṇa kiṃ prārthayasi? kanyābhikṣām;
V03vinv15_u:20_62: kasyārthāya? śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasya putraḥ sujāto nāmnā;
V03vinv15_u:20_65: [A_318a] kiyatprabhūtam? śatam aśvānāṃ śataṃ niṣkāṇāṃ śatam aśvatarīrathānāṃ śataṃ kāmbojikānāṃ kanyānām iti;
V03vinv15_u:20_66: madhuskandhena (MSV III 137) mānavenānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater anenārthena lekho dattaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:20_67: tenāpi vācayitvā pratīccha sarvaṃ mayā deyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:20_69: tatas taiḥ śucinā praṇītena prabhūtenāhāreṇa saṃtarpito mānavakaḥ śālāṃ gatvā vāsam upagato viṣūcitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_70: aparicitā brāhmaṇāḥ; sa tair aśucibhayād bahir niṣkāsayitvā cchoritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_71: daivād āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau taṃ pradeśam āgatau;
V03vinv15_u:20_72: sa tābhyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ; tatas tābhyāṃ vaṃśavidalikayā nirlikhya pāṇḍumṛttikayā udvartya snāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_75: sa tayor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_77: sa vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhavanaṃ prārthayate;
V03vinv15_u:20_78: sa kathayati: gaccha tad eva te śivikādvāraṃ bhavanam iti;
V03vinv15_u:20_80: videharājena rājño biṃbisārasya haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ sātam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:20_82: mama videharājena haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ śatam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:20_84: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kosalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:20_85: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:20_87: tatra gatvā āgamiṣyāmīti; rājā kathayati: śobhanaṃ gaccha mamāpi tasmāt hastiśatam āneyaṃ (MSV III 138) tad aneṣyasīti;
V03vinv15_u:20_88: sa kathayati: deva yadi mama tatra prayojanaṃ ḥnaḥ bhavati grahīṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:23_0: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_1: sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate:
V03vinv15_u:23_2: uttiṣṭhāryā uttiṣṭha; bhadramukhāḥ kāṣṭhāni pāṭayata samitiṃ prajvālayata;
V03vinv15_u:23_3: bhaktaṃ pacata; sūpikaṃ pacata; khādyakāny ullāḍayata; pratijāgṛta maṇḍalavāṭam iti;
V03vinv15_u:23_5: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:23_7: pūgo vā parṣado vā? rājā vānena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_8: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:23_9: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv15_u:23_10: vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita iti;
V03vinv15_u:23_11: sa kathayati: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ,
V03vinv15_u:23_12: na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita;
V03vinv15_u:23_13: iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny [A_318b] āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv15_u:23_14: sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:23_15_0: ka eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma? asti gṛhapate śramaṇo [Śay-v_15] gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ (MSV III 139) śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya
V03vinv15_u:23_15_1: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_17_0: sa eṣa gṛhapate buddho nāma; ka eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma? santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrū avatārya
V03vinv15_u:23_17_1: kāṣāyāṇy vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_18_0: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā
V03vinv15_u:23_18_1: anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_19: sa eṣa gṛhapate saṅgho nāma; ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_20: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
V03vinv15_u:23_22: labhyaṃ gṛhapate so 'smābhir bhagavān draṣṭum? tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
V03vinv15_u:23_23: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
V03vinv15_u:23_24: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_26: tena khalu samayena śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv15_u:23_27: pūrvakaṃ paścimakaṃ ca, māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv15_u:23_28: yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam;
V03vinv15_u:23_29: tasyaitad adhavat: nūnaṃ prabhātā rajanī: tathā hi śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv15_u:23_30: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_31: samanantaraniṣkrāntasya cāsya ya ālokaḥ (MSV III 140) so 'ntarhitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_32_0: andhakāraṃ prādurbhūtam; tasyābhūd bhayam; abhūc chambhitatvaṃ; abhūd romaharṣah; māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo
V03vinv15_u:23_32_1: vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam iti;
V03vinv15_u:23_33: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
V03vinv15_u:23_34: namaskaroti ca; atha madhuskandhasya devaputrasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv15_u:23_36: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:23_37: iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:23_38: abhikrama gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:23_39: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /
V03vinv15_u:23_42: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrāma; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv15_u:23_46: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrama; abhikramatas (MSV III 141) te śreyo bhavati;
V03vinv15_u:23_50: abhikrāma gṛhapate, mā pratikrāma; abhikrāmatas te śreyo bhavati;
V03vinv15_u:23_51: na pratikrāmataḥ; [A_319a] athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:23_52: kas tvam bhadrmukha? aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_53: tavaiva purāṇo gṛhasakhā; so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:23_55: tasmād aham evaṃ vadāmi: abhikrāma gṛhapate mā pratikrāma;
V03vinv15_u:23_57: na pratikrāmata iti; athānāthapiṇḍādasya gṛhapater etad abhavat:
V03vinv15_u:23_58: nāvaro buddho bhaviṣyati, nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānaṃ, yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
V03vinv15_u:23_59: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_60: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrameṇa caṅkramyate,
V03vinv15_u:23_62: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam durād eva;
V03vinv15_u:23_63: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_65: (MSV III 142) kaccid bhagavān sukhaṃ śāyita iti;
V03vinv15_u:23_66: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
V03vinv15_u:23_67: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ / [Śay-v_17]
V03vinv15_u:23_68: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
V03vinv15_u:23_71: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_72: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:23_73: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,
V03vinv15_u:23_74: saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv15_u:23_75: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:23_76: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv15_u:23_77: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:23_78: athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:23_80: tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv15_u:23_81: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:23_82: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
V03vinv15_u:23_83_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā (MSV III 143) paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ
V03vinv15_u:23_83_1: aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv15_u:23_84: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavantam idam [A_319b] avocat;
V03vinv15_u:23_87: dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca; upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv15_u:23_88: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat:
V03vinv15_u:23_89: kinnāmā tvaṃ gṛhapate? aham asmi bhadanta sudatto nāmnā;
V03vinv15_u:23_91: tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
V03vinv15_u:23_92: kutobhūmakas tvaṃ gṛhapate? [Śay-v_18] asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:25_0: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
V03vinv15_u:26_0: āgacchatu bhagavān śrāvastīm; ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣaiyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv15_u:26_1: santi gṛhapate vihārāḥ śrāvastyām? no bhadanta:
V03vinv15_u:26_2: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv15_u:26_3: āgacchatu bhagavān; ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
V03vinv15_u:26_4: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
V03vinv15_u:26_6: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:26_7: tato 'sya yad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya (MSV III 144) punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:26_8: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:26_10: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakan yena sahāyakena śrāvastyāṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:26_11: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati; katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo vidheyaḥ? paśyati śāriputrasya bhikṣoḥ;
V03vinv15_u:26_13: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:26_15: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt ptakrāntaḥ
V03vinv15_u:29_0: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv15_u:29_2: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya,
V03vinv15_u:29_3: samādāya pātracīvaraṃ, yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_4: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_5: sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ caṅkramam anucaṅkramyamāṇo suvicarann evam āha:
V03vinv15_u:29_6: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre [Śay-v_19] nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇo 'lpavilāpo rātrāv alpaśabdo 'lpanirghoṣaḥ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:29_9: jetasya kumarasyārāmam śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdṃ alpanirghoṣaṃ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam;
V03vinv15_u:29_12: sa praviśann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_15: ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti;
V03vinv15_u:29_16: sa kathayati; na me gṛhapate sa ārāmaḥ; kin tu udyānaṃ tan mameti; dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:29_20: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir jetaṃ kumaram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:29_22: pratīccha hiraṇyasuvarṇam; mamārāmaḥ; kaḥ kṛtārghaḥ? tvaṃ kṛtārghaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_23: tau kṛtārgho na kṛtargha iti vivādam āpannau,
V03vinv15_u:29_26: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ vihāraṃ māpayitum;
V03vinv15_u:29_27: sāhāyyam asyānuṣṭheyam iti; tato vyāvahārikapuruṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya
V03vinv15_u:29_28: arthādhikaraṇe niṣaṇṇāḥ; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv15_u:29_29: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa nivedayati;
V03vinv15_u:29_31: pratīccha suvarṇam: gṛhapatre ārāma iti; sa tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakaṭair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya,
V03vinv15_u:29_33: na parisamāpyate; tiṣṭhate evānāstīrṇaḥ kaścit pṛthivīpradeśaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_34: tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt;
V03vinv15_u:29_36: nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:29_38: jetaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati; nūnam anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater vipratisāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_39: kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi;
V03vinv15_u:29_40: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam [Śay-v_20] avocat;
V03vinv15_u:29_41: sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam;
V03vinv15_u:29_42: mamaivārāmaḥ; na me kumāra vipratisāraḥ; api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:29_43: katarat tan nidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati? nātistokaṃ nātiprabhūtaṃ,
V03vinv15_u:29_48: nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam; yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati;
V03vinv15_u:29_49: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:29_52: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumārasya anāstīrṇaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam anuprayacchati;
V03vinv15_u:29_53: yatra jetaḥ kumāro bhagavato 'rthāya dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ māpayati
V03vinv15_u:32_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum ārabdha iti tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasas tīrthyās te saṃbhūya yenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:32_1: upasaṃkramya kathayanti: mā tvaṃ gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya arthāyātra vihāraṃ kāraya;
V03vinv15_u:32_4: asmākaṃ śrāvastī; sa kathayati: bhājitāni yuṣmābhir nagarāṇi,
V03vinv15_u:32_5: na tu madīyam svāpateyam; yasyābhipretaṃ tasya dharmaskandhaṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:32_6: te rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ; tatrāpy anāthapiṇḍadena parājitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:32_11: kāraya vihāram iti; sa kathayati: śobhanam; āryaśāriputraṃ tāvad avalokayāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:32_13: upasaṅkramyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:32_14: ekantaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat;
V03vinv15_u:32_19: kāraya vihāram iti; katham atra pratipattavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:32_21: kim eṣāṃ santi kānicit kuśalamūlāni uta na santīti;
V03vinv15_u:32_22: paśyati, santi; kasyāntike pratibaddhāni; mamaiva; punaḥ saṃlakṣayati; kim etāvanta eva mama pratibaddhā vineyā āhosvid anye 'pi vādena vineyāḥ santīti;
V03vinv15_u:32_23: tu saptame divase; tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prītiprāmodyajāto yena tīrthyās tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:32_26: śobhanam, evaṃ bhavatu; kiṃ tu saptame divase iti; te saṃlakṣayanti; dvābhyām atra kāraṇābhyām bhavitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:32_28: kim atra prāptakālam; vayam api pakṣaṃ samanveṣāmaha iti;
V03vinv15_u:32_30: taiḥ pakṣam samanveṣamānai raktākṣo nāma parivrājako dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:32_31: sa tair uktaḥ; tvam asmākaṃ sabrahmacāri; śramaṇasya gautamasyāgraśrāvako 'smābhir vādenāhūtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:32_32: sa pakṣaṃ samanveṣate; tvam asmākaṃ sāhāyyaṃ kalpaya;
V03vinv15_u:32_34: śobhanam, evaṃ bhavatu; yadā yuṣmākaṃ sannipato bhavati tadā mamārocayitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:35_0: yāvat saptame divase anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā;
V03vinv15_u:35_3: śrāvastīnivāsī janakāyaḥ anekāni ca tatsāmatanivāsīni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi,
V03vinv15_u:35_4: kānicit kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kūśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni;
V03vinv15_u:35_5_0: tata āyuṣmān śāriputro 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā saparivāreṇa saṃpuraskṛto vādimaṇḍalaṃ praviśya vineyajanam abhisaṃīkṣya
V03vinv15_u:35_6: sarvaiva sā parṣad avahitacetaskā āyuṣmantam śāriputraṃ abhisamīkṣamāṇā niṣaṇṇnā
V03vinv15_u:38_1: bhavantaḥ kiṃ tāvat kariṣyatha? āhosvid vikariṣyatha? te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:38_2: vayaṃ kurmaḥ: tvāṃ vikuru; āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:38_3: yady ahaṃ kariṣyāmi; sadevako 'pi loko na śakṣyati vikartum;
V03vinv15_u:38_5: iti viditvā raktākṣaṃ parivrājakam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:38_6: tvaṃ kuru, ahaṃ vikariṣyāmīti; sa indrajāle kṛtāvī; tena supuṣpitaḥ sahakārapādapo nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_8: yenāsau samūla utpāṭya itaś cāmutaś ca vikīrṇo yogijanānām apy aviṣayībhūtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_9: tatad tena padminī nirmitā; āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa kalabhahastī nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_10: tena sā samantān marditā; tena saptaśīrṣo nāgo nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_12: yenāsāv apahṛtaḥ; tena vetāḍo nirmitaḥ; āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa mantraiḥ kīlitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_14: sa tasyaivopari pradhāvitaḥ; tato 'sau bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādayor nipatitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_17: sa vetāḍo vyupaśāntaḥ; tasyāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_18: sa prasādajātaḥ kathayati: labheyāham āryaśāriputra svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv15_u:38_20: āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa sa pravrājitaḥ upasaṃpāditaḥ avavādo dattaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:38_21: tenodyacchamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam;
V03vinv15_u:38_22: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ; traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñapratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhaparāṅmukhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_23: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_27: iti viditvā āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya mukhe 'valokikāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_28_0: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā
V03vinv15_u:38_28_1: kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ satvasahasraiḥ mahān viśeṣa āgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_30: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau; kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
V03vinv15_u:38_33: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam; kāiścid anāgāmiphalam; kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśasaṃprahāṇāḍ arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam;
V03vinv15_u:38_35: dharmapravaṇā, saṅghaprāgbhārā, vyavasthāpitā; tīrthyāḥ saṃlakṣayanti; na śakyam asmābhir ayaṃ vāde nigrahītum;
V03vinv15_u:38_36: upāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartavyam; atraiva bhṛtikayā karma kurmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_37: tataś chidraṃ labdhvā baiṣkeṇainaṃ praghātayāma iti;
V03vinv15_u:38_38: te sarve saṃbhūya anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti;
V03vinv15_u:38_40: tad anukampāṃ kuru; tvadīyavihāre bhṛtikayā karma kurmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_41: ciraṃ vayam atra avasthitāḥ; mā deśaparityāgaṃ kūrma iti; anāthapiṇḍadaḥ kathayati: āryaśāriputraṃ tāvad avalokayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:38_44: ḥāryaḥ, tīrthyāḥ kathayanti, kathayanti, asmākaṃ tvayā sarvāṇi vṛttipadāni samucchinnāni;
V03vinv15_u:38_45: tad anukampāṃ kuru; tvadīye vihāre bhṛtikayā karma kurmaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_46: ma deśaparityāgaṃ kurma iti; āyuṣmāṃś chāriputraḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_47: kiṃ teṣāṃ santi kānicit kuśalamūlāni āhosvin na santi iti paśyati,
V03vinv15_u:38_48: santi; kasyāntike pratibaddhāni; mamaiveti; samanvāhṛtya kathayati: gṛhapate evaṃ bhavatu, ko 'tra virodha iti; te tasmin vihāre bhṛtikayā karma kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_49: āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa latāvārikaḥ puruṣo raudro nirmitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_51: āyuṣmān śāripuptraḥ teṣāṃ vinayakālaṃ jñātvā tatsamīpe vṛkṣamūlasyādhastāc caṅkramyamāṇas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv15_u:38_52: sa tair dṛṣṭaḥ; te saṃlakṣayanti, [A_322a] ayam asya kālaḥ praghātayituṃ pravivikte tiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv15_u:38_53: te tasya sakāśam upasaṅkramya parivārya avasthitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:38_55: kīdṛśena cittena ete matsakāśam upasaṅkrāntā iti;
V03vinv15_u:38_59_0: te kathayanti: ārya śāriputra paritrāyasva; sa kathayati: āyuśman gaccha; viśrāmyantu tāvad iti; te saṃlakṣayanti; īdṛśo
V03vinv15_u:38_59_1: 'sty ayaṃ mahātmā; vayam asya vadhakacittāḥ; eṣo 'smākaṃ maitracittaḥ iti viditvā abhiprasannāḥ;

V03vinv15_u:41_3_1: śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ity arhantaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;

V03vinv15_u:44_0: tatra āyuṣmatā śariputreṇa vihārasūtram ekānte gṛhītam;
V03vinv15_u:44_4: nāhetvapratyayam āryśāriputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti;
V03vinv15_u:44_5: kaḥ āryaśāriputra hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya? enam etad gṛhapate,
V03vinv15_u:44_6: evam etat; nāhetvapraytyayaṃ tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti;
V03vinv15_u:44_7: tvayā ceha sūtraṃ gṛhītam; tuṣite devanikāye sauvarṇam bhavanam abhinirvṛttam;
V03vinv15_u:44_9: āryaśāriputra yady evaṃ, tena hi punaḥ sūtraṃ prasāraya bhūyasyā mātrayā;
V03vinv15_u:44_10: cittam abhiprasādayāmīti; āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa tat sūtram gṛhītam;
V03vinv15_u:44_11: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā bhuyasyā mātrayā tīvreṇa prasādavegena cittam abhiprasāditam;
V03vinv15_u:44_12: yena prasādajātena samanantaram eva tat sauvarṇaṃ bhavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ saṃvṛttam;
V03vinv15_u:44_14: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā uttarottarapravṛddhapuṇyasantatinā ṣoḍaśamahallikā vihārā māpitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:44_16: ṣoḍaśamahallikān vihārān māpayitvā ṣaṣṭiṃ ca kuṭikāvastūni sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān śāriputras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:44_18: kiyatpramāṇair āryaśāriputra prayāṇakair bhagavān adhvānaṃ gacchati? tadyathā gṛhapate rājā cakravartī;
V03vinv15_u:44_19: kiyatpramāṇai rājā cakravartī? daśakrośakair gṛhapate rājā cakravartī prayāṇakair adhvānaṃ gacchati;
V03vinv15_u:44_20: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca rājagṛham atrāntarād vāsakān parisaṅkhyāya parikramaṇakā māpitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:47_1: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa; yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāma;
V03vinv15_u:47_2: upasaṅkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca spārśavihāratāṃ ca;
V03vinv15_u:47_3: evaṃ ca vada; āgacchatu bhagavān śravastīm;
V03vinv15_u:47_4: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ [Śay-v_25] cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena ḥitiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:47_5: evam ārya iti sa puruṣo 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ pratiśrutya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:47_7: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:47_8: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt;
V03vinv15_u:47_9: ekāntasthitaḥ sa puruṣo bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:47_10: anāthapiṇḍado bhadanta gṛhapatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate;
V03vinv15_u:47_12: sukhī bhavatu bhoḥ puruṣa anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tvaṃ ca;
V03vinv15_u:47_15: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅgheneti;
V03vinv15_u:47_17: atha sa puruṣo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ

V03vinv15_u:56_3: sā na prapatati; athānāthapiṇḍado gāhapatir durmanāḥ saṃlakṣayati;
V03vinv15_u:56_4: mā mayā kānicit sāpakṣālāni karmāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:56_5: bhagavān āha: na tvayā gṛhapate kānicit sāpakṣālāni karmāṇi kṛtāny api tv etasmin pradeśe sthitena tvayā pūrvakānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām ayaṃ pradeśo niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:56_8: bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa svayam eva jetavanam udghoṣayati;
V03vinv15_u:56_10: aho bata bhagavān mamāpi tatprathamataraṃ nāmodgrahaṇaṃ kuryād iti;
V03vinv15_u:56_11: bhagavatā jetasya kumārasya cetasā cittam ājñāya tatprathamata udgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv15_u:56_13: śrutvā jetaḥ kumāro 'tivābhiprasannaḥ mama bhagavatā tatprathamato nāmodgrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv15_u:56_14: tena prītiprāmodyajātena sarveṇaiva tena dravyajātena bhagavato 'rthāya catūratnamayaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ kāritam;
V03vinv15_u:56_15: tathā saṃgītakārair api sthaviraiḥ sūtra upanibaddham bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme iti
V03vinv15_u:58_0: Previous births of Anāthapiṇḍada at the time of the seven Buddhas
V03vinv15_u:59_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:59_1: kutra bhadantānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatināyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātitapūrvaḥ? iti;
V03vinv15_u:59_2_0: bhagavān āha; bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavate kalpe vipāśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
V03vinv15_u:59_2_1: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:59_4: tena khalu samayenāsyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ tiṣyo nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:59_5: tenāyaṃ pradeśaḥ ṣaṭkrośahiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya rājakumārasyāntikāt krītvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_7: tiṣyasya gṛhapater bhāgineyaḥ tatsaṃparkād vipaśyini tathāgate 'tyartham abhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_9: sa saṃlakṣayati: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāham etaṃ rātrau divā cānāvṛtaṃ pāśyeyam iti tasyāntevasinā samudratīrasthenāvabhāsātmakaṃ maṇiratnaṃ prāvṛtam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:59_11: tadanubhāvād asau taṃ keśanakhastūpaṃ divā rātrau cānāvṛtaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv15_u:59_13: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo mama mātulena kumārasyāntikāt krītvā hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_14: evam aham imam pṛthivīpradeśaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātayeyam;
V03vinv15_u:59_15: yaś ca teṣām apaścimaka tasyāham antike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām iti
V03vinv15_u:59_16: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau tasya gṛhapater [A_324a] bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:59_17: tato 'rvāg ekatriṃśatime kalpe śikhī nāma sāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad huddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:59_19: tena kyalu punaḥ samayena puṣyo nāma gṛhaptir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:59_20: tenāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhatṛtīyān kośān maṇibhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya śikhinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_21: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣyo nāma grhapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam,
V03vinv15_u:59_22: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:59_23: tato 'rvak tasminn evaikatriṃśatime kalpe viśvabhuṅ nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:59_25: tena khalu samayena māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:59_26: tenāyaṃ pradeśo dvau krośau muktikābhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya viśvabhujaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_27_0: syāt khalu yuṣmākan bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ [Śay-v_29] sa tena kālena tena samayena māghur māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti? na
V03vinv15_u:59_27_1: khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:59_28: tato 'rvāg asmin bhadrake kalpe krakutsundo nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:59_30: tena khalu samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:59_31: tenāpy ayaṃ prādeśo gobhiḥ pūrayitvā kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya krakutsundasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśravakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_32: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛthapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam,
V03vinv15_u:59_33: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:59_34: tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃṣadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kanakamunir nāma śāstā loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:59_36: tena khalu samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:59_37: tenāpy ayaṃ pradeśaḥ paṭṭair āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya niṣkrīya kanakamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_38: syāt khalu ḥyuṣmākaṃḥ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv15_u:59_39: api tv esa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:59_40: tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān:
V03vinv15_u:59_42: tena khalu samayena āṣāḍho nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:59_43: tenāpy ayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhakroṣaṃ sauvarṇair yāvair āstīrya [A_324b] kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ ;
V03vinv15_u:59_44: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo anyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena āṣāḍho nāma gṛhapatir ahbūd iti:
V03vinv15_u:59_45: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam, api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena [Śay-v_30]
V03vinv15_u:59_46_0: etarhy apy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstā loka utpannas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
V03vinv15_u:59_47: aham apy ardhatrayodaśaśataprivāra imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:59_48: etarhy apy anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ṣoḍaśalāṅgalāvaktākoṭai saṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya mama saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ
V03vinv15_u:59_49: bhaviṣyati bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'py aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma śāstā ṣaṇṇavatyarhatkoṭīsahasraparivāra imaṃ pradeśam āgamiṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:59_50: tena khalu samayena sudhano nāma gṛhapatir udbhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:59_51: so 'pīmaṃ pradeśaṃ trīṇi yojanāni hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya maitreyasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātayiṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:59_52: tasyaiva śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:59_53: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sudhano nāma gṛhaptir abhūd iti? na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam,
V03vinv15_u:59_54: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sudhano nāma grhapatir udbhaviṣyati
V03vinv15_u:61_0: Anāthapiṇḍada has the power to see absconded treasures, no matter whether close or far away
V03vinv15_u:62_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati svāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
V03vinv15_u:62_1: sāmantakena śabdo nisṛta anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān ḥapiḥ asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:62_2: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulānāṃ nānātīrthikaśramaṇabrāhmaṇacarakaparivrājakānāṃ kutūhalaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:62_3_0: katamena bhavanto lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api
V03vinv15_u:62_3_1: jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py [Śay-v_31] antike? tena khalu samayena upagur nāma māṇava tasyām eva parṣadi saṃnisaṇṇo
V03vinv15_u:62_4: sa kathayati: alpotsukā yūyaṃ bhavanto bhavantu;
V03vinv15_u:62_5_0: ahaṃ vicārya bhavatām kathayiṣyāmi yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvamikān
V03vinv15_u:62_5_1: api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:62_6: so 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateś cāravihārānveṣatatparaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho yāvad apareṇa samayenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nadyām ajiravatyāṃ snātvā uttīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:62_8: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ paśyann eva tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:62_9_0: sa kathayati: [A_325a] vijñāto 'si gṛhapate kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ tvam yena nidhīn paśyasi sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān
V03vinv15_u:62_9_1: api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:62_10: tena tīrthyānām ārocitam; tīrtyair api vikatthamānaiḥ samantād ārocitam;
V03vinv15_u:62_11: sāmantena śabdo visṛtaḥ; athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ yena nidhīn paśyati
V03vinv15_u:62_12: sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
V03vinv15_u:62_14_0: bhagavān āha; tīrthyakoṭiśatasahasreṇāpi bhikṣavo na sukaram ājñātuṃ yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn
V03vinv15_u:62_14_1: paśyati api tu ratnacitrāntakośo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir hiraṇyeśvaraś ca yena nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api
V03vinv15_u:62_14_2: sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike
V03vinv15_u:62_15: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:62_16: kiṃ bhadānta anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntakośo hiranyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ? bhagavān āha:
V03vinv15_u:62_17: anāthapiṇḍadenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtyāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv15_u:62_18: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:62_19_0: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtany upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau ḥvipacyanteḥ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātāv api tūpātteṣv
V03vinv15_u:62_19_1: eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
V03vinv15_u:62_20: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv15_u:62_21: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // [Śay-v_32]
V03vinv15_u:64_0: The story of the Pratyekabuddha (concerning a previous life of Anāthapiṇḍada)
V03vinv15_u:65_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālapratigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv15_u:65_1: sa saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvajīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe sāntarjanena udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_2: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv15_u:65_3: yāvad anyataro pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_8: bhāgy ahaṃ yasya me udyāne tādṛśaḥ pravrajito 'vasthitaḥ iti prasādajātas taddarśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_9: sa mahātmā nirupadhiśeṣam nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśya parinirvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_10: tatas tena gṛhapatinā suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavāntarjanasahīyena mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_12: tāny asthīni sphaṭikamaye kumbhe ratnair vyāmiśrya prakṣiptāni;
V03vinv15_u:65_13: tāny antaḥsthāny avabhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti;
V03vinv15_u:65_14: tatas tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv15_u:65_15: yathā tasyāsthīni ratnamiśrāṇy atyarthaṃ bhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti evam evāham anena kuśalamūlena ratnacitrāntakośaḥ syāṃ hiraṇyeśvaraś ca iti
V03vinv15_u:65_16: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau gṛhapatiḥ tena kālena tena samayena eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_17_0: yad anena pratyekabuddhe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yac ca tiṣyasya gṛhapates bhāgineyena satā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
V03vinv15_u:65_17_1: keśanakhastūpe avabhāsātmake maṇir āropitaḥ tasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntrakośo hiraṇyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_18: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklo vyatimiśrāṇām vyatimiśraḥ;
V03vinv15_u:65_19: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyam yat [Śay-v_33] kṛṣṇāṇi karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitāvyam
V03vinv15_u:67_0: tiṣyaḥ puṣyaś ca māghuś ca bhavadatto bṛhaspatiḥ /
V03vinv15_u:67_1: āṣāḍhaś ca sudattaś ca sudhano bhavati paścimam //
V03vinv15_u:67_2: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca maṇimuktā tṛtīyakam /
V03vinv15_u:67_3: gobhiḥ paṭair yavaiḥ koṭir hiraṇyena samucchritā //
V03vinv15_u:70_0_0: yadānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā koṭīsaṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasya sakāśān niṣkrīya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya
V03vinv15_u:70_0_1: niryātitaṃ tadā nānādeśanivāsinaḥ śrāddhāś caityābhivandakā śrāvastīṃ gacchanti;
V03vinv15_u:70_2: ārya vayam apy āryasaṃghāya jetavane kiṃcid vastu kārayema –für kārayāma?– iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_3: bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti: mūlyena bhūmiṃ krītvā kārayata;
V03vinv15_u:70_5: iyatā hiraṇyena; ārya kuto 'smākam etāvad bhavati;
V03vinv15_u:70_6: tathāpi tu yady etasmin pradeśe labhāmahe kārayāma iti
V03vinv15_u:70_8: bhagavān āha: gṛhapatir avalokayitavyaḥ; yady anujānīte kārayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_10: sa kathayati; māmāgamya śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃghasyārthāya puṇyakriyāvastu kurvanti anujānāmi;
V03vinv15_u:70_13: bhagavān āha; tasmād anujānāmi saṃghasyārthāya kārayitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:70_17: anyeṣāṃ saṃstutikā [Śay-v_34] na santi te vihanyante;
V03vinv15_u:70_18: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: āgantukānām arthāya anuddiṣṭaṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_22: tannivāsino bhikṣavaḥ saṃtrastā apravāritāḥ santaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_23: te bhikṣubhiḥ pratiśrāmitāḥ mārgaśrame prativinodite kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:70_27: katham idānīṃ yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthitasya eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayatha;
V03vinv15_u:70_28: yady asti vo kaukṛtyaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā prayacchata śayanāsanam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_29: tathāpi te noddiśanti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:70_30: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: tasmād anujānāmi bhaṅgikabhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_31: bhikṣavo na jānate: kathaṃ kartavyā iti; bhagavān āha: traimāsikī pravāraṇā kartavyā śrāvaṇamāse tu dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_32: uktaṃ bhagavatā: bhaṅgibhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti
V03vinv15_u:70_33: yāvad apare 'pi bhaṅgibhagnakā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_35: bhagavān āha: bhaṅgibhagnakān mayā bhikṣavo bhikṣūn āgamya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā prajñaptā,
V03vinv15_u:70_36: na tṛtīyā; bhaṅgibhagnakās tu bhikṣavaḥ yathāsaṃstutikayā viśrāmayitavyāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_38: bhagavān āha: na te karmādānaṃ kārayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_40: bhagavān āha: na teṣāṃ lābho deyah; bhikṣava āmiṣalābham api nānuprayacchanti;
V03vinv15_u:70_41: bhagavān āha: āmiṣalābhas teṣāṃ no tu vastralābha iti [Śay-v_35]
V03vinv15_u:70_44: te śūnyakās tiṣṭhanti; dānapatīnāṃ paribhogānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati;
V03vinv15_u:70_45: vātaputraiś cāvāsyante; bhagavāṇ āha: sarve uddeṣṭavyāḥ pratyekam ekaikasya dvau trayaś catvāro vā yathāpramāṇataḥ sarve paribhoktavyāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:70_46: kvacit pūrvāhṇe sthātavyam, kvacin madhyāhne, kvacid aparāhṇe, kvacid rātrau vastavyam iti; bhikṣavas te punaḥ karma na kurvanti pralubhyante;
V03vinv15_u:70_47: bhagavān āha: dānapatir utsāhayitavyaḥ; sa vai saṃpadyata ity evaṃ kuśalam,
V03vinv15_u:70_49: na cet śakyate yāvatāṃ śakyate tāvatāṃ saṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:70_50: yadā bhagavataḥ vaistārikaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ tadā bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_51_0: te layane nirvihanyante; bhagavān āha: dvayos trayāṇām coddeṣṭavyam antataḥ sarveṣāṃ sāmānyena niṣadanaprāmāṇikam uddeṣṭavyam
V03vinv15_u:70_52: sāmīcī ca parasparam upacāras tu sāmānya eva noddeṣṭavya iti
V03vinv15_u:70_53: uktaṃ bhagavatā; ekāny araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhapalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni [Śay-v_36] prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata,
V03vinv15_u:70_54: bhikṣavaḥ, mā pramādyata, mā paścād vipratisāriṇo [A_326b] bhūta iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_56: tadā kecid bhikṣava āraṇyakatvaṃ samādāya araṇye 'dhyavasthitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_57: te tatra coraiḥ muṣyante; muṣitāḥ santaḥ brāhmaṇagṛhapatikulebhyaś cīvarārthaṃ paryeṣṭim āpadyamānāḥ riṃcanty uddeśaṃ pāṭham svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ manasikāram;
V03vinv15_u:70_59: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_60: uktaṃ bhagavatā: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_62: āraṇyako bhikṣuḥ pātracīvaraṃ sthāpayitvā dvāraṃ baddhvā tāḍakam ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_64: bhagavān āha: prakāśe sthāne āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_66: sa tatra na prativasati; yo bhikṣur āgantuka āgacchati tasmai vastu dadāti lābhaṃ tv ātmanā gṛhṇāti;
V03vinv15_u:70_69_0: sa pṛcchati, kasyāyaṃ vihāraḥ iti; bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti: upanandasya bhikṣoḥ; sa tena gatvā yācitaḥ; sa kathayati: ayaṃ vihāraḥ,
V03vinv15_u:70_69_1: prativasa; yo 'tra lābhaḥ sa mama iti; tatrāvasthitaḥ; tenāsau vihāro na kadācit saṃmṛṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:70_72: anyo bhikṣur āgataḥ; so 'py upanandasya sakāśād yācitvā tasmin vihāre 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_74: tenāsau saṃmṛṣṭaḥ saṃkāraṃ chorayitvā saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvaiva saṃkārakuṭasamīpe 'vasthitaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:70_76: sa kathayati: āyuṣman kiṃ tvaṃ saṃmārjanīvyagrahasta evāvatiṣṭhase,
V03vinv15_u:70_79: tena na kadācit saṃmārjanīpadam api dattam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_80: sa kathayati: amuko 'tra traicīvariko [Śay-v_37] bhikṣur avasthitaḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_81: yāvat tenāsau piṇḍapātam aṭatā dṛṣṭa upālabdhaś ca;
V03vinv15_u:70_82: sa kathayati: upanando lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti ahaṃ tasya vihāraṃ śodhayāmi? iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_84: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: yo lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti tena vihāraḥ saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ iti
V03vinv15_u:70_85: uktaṃ bhagavatā: abhyatītakālagatānāṃ dānapatīnām nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādeṣṭavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_88: tenāsau śrutaḥ; dakṣiṇām ādiśat; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:70_89: ārya yady ahaṃ vihāraṃ kārayāmi mamāpi nāmnā dakṣiṇām uddiśasi iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_90: sa kathayati: kāraya suṣṭv ādiśāmi iti; yāvat tena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kāritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_91: tatrānena na kiṃcid dattaṃ; sa śūnya evāvasthitaḥ; yāvat tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_92: sa vihāram āgamya kathayati: ārya madīyo vihāraḥ śūnya avasthitaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:70_93: na tatra kaścid bhikṣuḥ prativasati iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_94_0: saṃghasthaviraḥ kathayati: bhadramukha utsvedyaḥ; sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati: ārya ūṣare jaṃgale kāritaḥ, kathaṃ utsvedyo bhavati?
V03vinv15_u:70_94_1: gṛhapate [A_327a] nāham etat saṃdhāya kathayāmi api tu tatra lābho nāsti iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_95: sa kathayati: ārya idānīṃ yo madīye vihāre prativasati tam ahaṃ paṭenācchādayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:70_96: iti lābho labhyate iti upanandena anupūrveṇa svabhāga iva udgṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_97: so 'nyatraiva prativasati; sa śūnyas tiṣṭhati, yāvad anyatamaḥ piṇḍapātiko caityābhivandakaḥ śrāvastīm āgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:70_99: sa bhikṣūn pṛcchati; kasyāyaṃ vihāraḥ iti; taiḥ samākhyātam: sāṃghiko 'yaṃ vihāraḥ kiṃ tūpanandasya bhikṣor uddiṣṭa iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_103: pañcānuśaṃsā saṃmarjane; ātmanaś cittaṃ prasīdati; parasya cittaṃ [Śay-v_38] prasīdati;
V03vinv15_u:70_104: devatā āttamanaso bhavanti; prāsādikasaṃvartanīyaṃ kuśalamūlam upacinoti;
V03vinv15_u:70_105: kāyasya bhedāt sugato svargaloke deveṣūpapadyata iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_106: ye taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ paśyanti te tasya gṛhapater gatvā ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:70_108: yāvad apareṇa samayena svayam evāgataḥ paśyati tathaiva taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭam;
V03vinv15_u:70_110: upanandena śrutam; sa tvaritatvaritaṃ gataḥ kathayati;
V03vinv15_u:70_112: prayaccha me paṭakam iti; piṇḍapātika saṃlakṣayati: lābhātmako 'yaṃ yadi na dāsyāmi tathāpy ayaṃ balād grahīṣyati māṃ ca vihārān niṣkāsayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_113: tena tasya samarpitaḥ iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:70_114: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: yasya prasannaḥ prasannādhikāraṃ karoti tasyaiva sa;
V03vinv15_u:70_116: guṇapriyo lokaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍyātmānaṃ sa putradāraṃ ca;
V03vinv15_u:70_119: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antargṛhe bhoktuṃ gatānām adattādāyikair vihārā muṣyante;
V03vinv15_u:70_120: bhagavān āha: dvāraṃ baddhvā kuñcikām ādāya prakramitavyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_122: bhaganān āha: ārakṣakaṃ bhikṣuṃ sthāpayitvā gantavyam;
V03vinv15_u:70_125: sa kathayati: muñca dvāram iti; bhagavān āha; saṃjñā kartavyā sajvaro nirjvara iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_126: yadi kathayati sajvara iti na moktavyam;
V03vinv15_u:70_128: api tv āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā ardhaśākhā upasthāpayitavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_129: uktaṃ bhagavatā: āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā ardhaśākhā upasthāpayitavyā iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_130: bhikṣavo na jānīte kedṛśī ardhaśākhā iti;
V03vinv15_u:70_131: bhagavān āha: kukkuro bhikṣavo ardhaśākhā tasya pātraśeṣaṃ dātavyam;
V03vinv15_u:70_133: te stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraṃ ca nakharikābhir upalikhanti uccāraprasrāveṇa nāśayanti;
V03vinv15_u:70_134: bhagavān āha: kukkurapoṣakasyāhaṃ bhikṣavo [Śay-v_39] bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñāpayāmi,
V03vinv15_u:70_135: [A_327b] kukkurapoṣakena bhikṣuṇā kālyam evotthāya stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraś ca pratyavekṣitavyaḥ yan nakharikābhir upalikhitaṃ tat samaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv15_u:70_137: kukkurapoṣako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān asamādāya vartate,
V03vinv15_u:73_2: upanandaḥ saṃlakṣayati: mayā nāmeha vihāre saṃghasthavireṇa bhūtvā dvitīyasthavireṇa bhavitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:73_3: gacchāmy anyaṃ vihāram iti; so 'nyaṃ vihāraṃ gataḥ; tato vihārād asau gataḥ; tasmin yo dvitīyasthavirasya lābha sa saṃghasthavirasya;
V03vinv15_u:73_4: sa saṃlakṣayati: ihāpi me eva lābha iti; tatrāpi me sa eva lābhaḥ, kiṃ vinā prayojanena saṃghasthaviratvaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv15_u:73_5: sa punas tvaritatvaritam eva vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_7: sa kathayati: yathāvṛddhikayā vihāram uddiśa iti;
V03vinv15_u:73_9: upanandaḥ kathayati: āyuṣmanta kiṃ tiṣṭhata eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayata,
V03vinv15_u:73_12: bhagavān āha: yaḥ saṃghikena vā staupikena ḥvāḥ karaṇīyena gato bhavati tasya śayanāsanaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyam,
V03vinv15_u:73_14: upananda atilobhena dvayor vihārayor varṣā upagataḥ ubhayavaihārikaṃ lābhaṃ lapsayata iti sa vṛttāsu varṣāsu lābhaṃ prārthayate naitasmin labhyate nāpy aparasmin;
V03vinv15_u:73_17: bhagavān āha: varṣoṣito 'sau deyo 'sya lābhaḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:73_20: ekasmāt prayacchanti; anye bhikṣavo 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivācayanti:
V03vinv15_u:73_21: uhayavihārayor varṣoṣitaḥ kimartham ekasamād dīyate iti;
V03vinv15_u:73_23: bhagavān āha:ḥ ubhayavihārābhyām apy ardhārdhaṃ deyam,
V03vinv15_u:73_24: na ca punar bhikṣuṇā dvayor vihārayor upagantavyaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:73_26: eka āraṇyakānāṃ, divtīyo grāmāntikānām; ācaritam tasya gṛhapter varṣoṣitasya bhikṣusaṃghasya ekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ paṭenācchādayitum;
V03vinv15_u:73_27: sa paṭakān ādāya āraṇyakānāṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_28: upanandena śrutam; āraṇyake vihāre lābho dīyate iti;
V03vinv15_u:73_29: tena nandasya saṃdiṣṭam; yady atra lābho dīyate tad grahīṣyasi ity uktvā sa tvaramāṇaḥ āraṇyakaṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_30: tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati: yādṛśo 'sya padoddhātaḥ; gato 'yam āraṇyakaṃ vihāram, kim atra prāptakālam, ihaiva tāvat grāmāntikavihāre dadāmi;
V03vinv15_u:73_31: paścāt tatra dāsyāmi iti; sa pratinivartya paṭakāṃś cārayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_32_0: nandena hastaḥ prasāritaḥ; gṛhapatinā paṭako dattaḥ; bhūyaḥ prasārayati; gṛhapatiḥ kathayati: ārya dattas te paṭakaḥ, kiṃ
V03vinv15_u:73_32_1: bhūyaḥ prasārayasi iti; sa kathayati: [A_328a] gṛhapate upanandas tava vihāre varṣoṣitaḥ tasya santakaṃ prārthayāmi iti;
V03vinv15_u:73_33: gṛhaptiḥ kathayati: ḥāryaḥ svahastena bhagavata dānaṃ praśastam,
V03vinv15_u:73_34: svahastenaiva dāsyāmi iti; sa lajjitas tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_35: upanandaḥ saṃlakṣayati: cirayaty asau gṛhapatiḥ, grāmāntikaṃ gamiṣyāmi iti viditvā grāmāntikavihāraṃ [Śay-v_41] gataḥ nandaṃ pṛcchati;
V03vinv15_u:73_36: ārya gṛhīto madīyaḥ paṭakaḥ? tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātam;
V03vinv15_u:73_37: gṛhapatir apy anyena pathā āraṇyakaṃ vihāram gatvā patākāṃś cārayitvā prakṛāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_39: yāvat paṭakāś cāritāḥ; sa ubhayavihārayor apy atilobhena lābhāt paribhraṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:73_41: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvaśaṃṣayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:73_42: paśya bhadanta upananda atilobhena paṭakāt paribhraṣṭah;
V03vinv15_u:73_43: bhagavān āha: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvany anena atilobhāt bhaktacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:75_0: The story of the dog vhich was too greedy (being a previous birth of Upananda)
V03vinv15_u:76_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo nadyā ubhayakūle dvau vihārau,
V03vinv15_u:76_1: ekaḥ saṃghalābhikānām, dvitīyo piṇḍapātikānām; yāvad anyatamaḥ kukkuraḥ gaṇḍīśabdapratisaṃvedī;
V03vinv15_u:76_2: sa gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃghalābhikānāṃ vihāraṃ gacchati;
V03vinv15_u:76_4: sa taṃ paribhujya piṇḍapātikānāṃ vihāraṃ gacchati,
V03vinv15_u:76_6: yāvad apareṇa samayena piṇḍapātikānām aupapādukānāṃ lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:76_7: tais sānukālaṃ gaṇḍī dattā; sa gaṇḍīkukkuraḥ gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śrutvā nadīm uttartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:76_8: madhyaṃ gatasyāsya saṃghalābhikānāṃ vihāre gaṇḍī dattā;
V03vinv15_u:76_11: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ? yo 'sau gaṇḍīkukkuraḥ tena kālena tena samayena eṣa evāsāv upanandaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:76_14: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo na bhikṣuṇā atilobhaḥ kartavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:79_0: Precautions to take against quarrelsome monks
V03vinv15_u:80_1_0: yathāpitad bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇvanti bhikṣavaḥ āgacchanti kalahakārakā ḥbhaṇḍanakārakā vigrahakārakāḥ vivādakārakā ādhikaraṇikā
V03vinv15_u:80_1_1: te 'smāṃś codayiṣyanti smārayiṣyanti alajjitena vā vaitarikeṇa vā iti;
V03vinv15_u:80_2: taiḥ teṣāṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyam? naivāsikair upāli bhikṣubhiḥ kalahakārikān bhikṣūn āgacchataḥ śrutvā trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ kartavyāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:80_3: ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ; trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ katame? haimantiko graiṣmiko vārṣakaś ca;
V03vinv15_u:80_4: ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ katame? sarvo vihāra uddeṣṭavyaḥ sarvo vihārasāmantakaḥ ḥsarvaḥ parigaṇaḥḥ sarvaḥ parigaṇasāmantakaḥ sarva ārāma sarva ārāmasāmantakaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:80_5: yadi kathayati vihāram uddiśata iti vaktavyam uddiṣṭo 'yam,
V03vinv15_u:80_7: parigaṇam uddiśata eṣo [A_328b] 'py uddiṣṭaḥ parigaṇasāmantakam uddiśata eṣo 'py uddiṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:80_10: te alayanā apratiṣṭhitāḥ kaṃcid doṣaṃ janayiṣyanti;
V03vinv15_u:80_11: tataḥ paścād gatavegaiḥ gatapratyarthikaiḥ gatapratyamitraiḥ yathāvṛddhikayā [Śay-v_43] śayanāsanam uddeṣṭavyam;
V03vinv15_u:80_12: uktaṃ bhagavatā: yathāvṛddhikayā śayanāsanam uddeṣṭavyam iti
V03vinv15_u:82_0: The care of the sick monks and Upananda's mischief again
V03vinv15_u:83_0: yāvad eko bhikṣur glānaḥ; tasya vṛddhataraka bhikṣur agataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:83_3: sa tena bhikṣuṇābhihitaḥ; āyuṣman mamaital layanam uddiṣṭam,
V03vinv15_u:83_4: nirgaccha iti; sa kathayati: glāno 'ham, yāvat svastībhavāmi; niṣṭhur asau bhikṣuḥ; sa tena puṣkariṇyāṃ niṣkāsya sthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:83_7: te kathayanti: āryā kim ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ kālagataḥ? bhadramukhā,
V03vinv15_u:83_8: nāyam kālagataḥ; atha kasmād atra sthāpitaḥ? asya vṛddhatarako bhjikṣur āgataḥ,
V03vinv15_u:83_11: āryā vayam āgārikāḥ santo 'nurakṣaṇayā glānagṛhān ḥnaḥ niṣkāsayāmaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:83_12: yūyaṃ pravrajitāḥ, kāruṇikaś ca yuṣmākaṃ śāstā, tat kathaṃ glānaṃ niṣkāsayatha? te 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivācayanti;
V03vinv15_u:83_14: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo glānasya bhikṣor vastuparihāro dātavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:83_15: uktaṃ bhagavatā: glānasya bhikṣor vastuparihāro deyaḥ iti
V03vinv15_u:83_16: āyuṣman upananda hum iti kṛtvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:83_17: yāvad ṣaḍbhir saptabhir vā divasaiḥ śayanāsanam uddekṣyati iti pāde vraṇapaṭṭakaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:83_18: śayanāsanoddeśakair bhikṣubhir glāna iti kṛtvā tatsantakaṃ layanaṃ uddiṣṭam;
V03vinv15_u:83_20: tatas sa glānāvalokakair bhikṣubhir pṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ sthavirasya pādaḥ svasthībhūtaḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:83_21: sa kathayati: nānūktaṃ bhagavatā sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti;
V03vinv15_u:83_22: tat kiṃ mama [Śay-v_44] vyādhir nityo bhaviṣyati? te kathayanti:
V03vinv15_u:83_24: ha kalpaglānaḥ iti; sa kathayati: kim icchatha māṃ jīrṇalayane prakṣeptum iti;
V03vinv15_u:83_26: katham idānīṃ bhikṣava aglānā eva vastuparihāraṃ svīkurvanti? etat prakaraṇam bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:83_27: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo kalpaglānasya vastuparihāro 'deyaḥ,
