V03vinv15_u:94_0: Upālin is the foremost amidst them who master and know the Vinaya. The teaching of the Vinaya
V03vinv15_u:95_0: bhagavatā vinayasya varṇo bhāṣita iti sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavaḥ sotsāhā vinayaṃ paṭhitum ārahdhāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_1: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān upālī agro 'bhūd vinayanidānasamutpattikuśalānām;
V03vinv15_u:95_2: sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo vinayaṃ paryavāpnuvanti iti satkṛtyoddeṣṭum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_3: sa utpāṇḍuko jātaḥ kṛśālako durbalako mlāno prāptakāyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_5: jānantaḥ pṛcchanti, ajānanto na pṛcchanti, kāle pṛcchanti, kālātikrāntaṃ na pṛcchanti, arthopasaṃhitaṃ pṛcchanti, anarthopasaṃhitaṃ na pṛcchanti;
V03vinv15_u:95_7: tatra kālajñā buddhā bhagavanta arthopasaṃhitāyāṃ pṛccchāyām;
V03vinv15_u:95_9: kasmād ānanda upālī bhikṣur utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśālako durbalako mlāno prāptakāya iti;
V03vinv15_u:95_10: sa kathayati: bhagavatā vinayasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ yat kṛtvā sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavaḥ sotsāhā vinayaṃ paṭhitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_11: āyuṣmān upālī sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavaḥ sagauravā vinayam paryavāpnuvanti iti satkṛtyoddeṣṭum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_12: tenāsāv utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśālako ḥdurbalakoḥ mlāno prāptakāya iti;
V03vinv15_u:95_13: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: uddeśadāyakasyāhaṃ ḥbhikṣavoḥ bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñāpayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:95_14: uddeśadāyakenā bhikṣuṇā caturbhir āryapathair uddeśo dātavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_16: uddeśagrāhakena bhikṣuṇā tṛbhir āryapathair uddeśo grahītavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_17_0: uddeśagrāhako bhikṣur uddeśadāyakasya bhikṣoḥ sacet cāṅkramyamāṇasyāgacchati navakaś [Śay-v_48] ca bhavati tena sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā
V03vinv15_u:95_17_1: dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā kāyam avanāmya ṛjukacittena sagauraveṇa padaparihāṇikayā uddeśo grahītavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_18: atha vṛddhatarako bhavati, tena dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā kāyam avanāmya ṛjukacittena sagauraveṇa padaparihāṇikagā uddeśo grahītavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_19: sacet tiṣṭhata āgacchati navakaś ca bhavati tena sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā utkuṭukena kṛtvā nīcatarake vā āsane niṣadya ṛjukacittena sagauraveṇoddeśo grahītavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_20: atha vṛddho bhavati tena dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā utkuṭukena sthitvā nīcatarake vā āsane niṣadya ṛjukacittena sagauraveṇa uddeśo grahītavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_21: yathā tiṣṭhata evaṃ niṣaṇṇasya nipannasya ca yojayitavyam:
V03vinv15_u:95_22: uddeśadāyakena bhikṣuṇā svabhyastaṃ suparicitaṃ niḥsaṃdhigdhaṃ ca kṛtvā uddeśo dātavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_23: uddeśagrāhakenāpi suparipṛṣṭam sūdgṛhītaṃ niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca kṛtvā uddeśo grahītavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:95_24: uddeśadāyako bhikṣur uddeśagrāhakaś ca yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān na samādāya vartate,
V03vinv15_u:97_0: The mischief of the Six Monks
V03vinv15_u:98_0: ṣaḍvargikā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ caranto rātrau vihāraṃ saṃprāptā yathasaṃstutikayā bhikṣubhiḥ pratiśāmitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:98_1: te kathayanti: āyuṣmantaḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatha śayanāsanoddeśakaṃ śabdayata;
V03vinv15_u:98_3: te kathayanti: śayanāsanaṃ sukhaṃ svaptāḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām uddiṣyayiṣyatha iti;
V03vinv15_u:98_4: te paryavasthitā kathayanti: yūyaṃ tiṣṭhata eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayata;
V03vinv15_u:98_5: yady asti kaukṛtyam uddiṣata yathāvṛddihikayā [Śay-v_49] śayanāsanam;
V03vinv15_u:98_8: yāvan navakā uddiśyante tāvat prabhātā rajanī;
V03vinv15_u:98_11: gacchāma iti; te bhikṣubhir ucyante: āyuṣmanto yuṣmābhir ekarātrasyārthāya kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ bhikṣusaṃgho viheṭhitaḥ aho bata yūyam ihaiva tiṣṭhata;
V03vinv15_u:98_12: te kathayanti: nandopananda śrāvastīm gacchāmaḥ savātalā eta iti kṛtvā prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:98_14: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo na rātrau śayanāsanam uddeṣṭavyam;
V03vinv15_u:101_1: sa tatrāgocarakuśalaḥ kālyam evotthāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat;
V03vinv15_u:101_3: tatraiva kuḍyamūlam niśritya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_4: anāthapiṇḍadaś ca tena pathā caityābhivandakaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_5: sa tena dṛṣṭa uktaś ca: ārya samantaprāsādike śāsane pravrajya kim ārāṭikāṃ karoṣi iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_6: sa kathayati: āyuṣman kātrārāṭikā, na paśyasi velām āsannām iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_7: sa kathayati: madīyaṃ gṛhaṃ kasmān na gataḥ iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_8: kiṃ nāma tvam; anāthapiṇḍadaḥ; asti mayā śrutaṃ teṣu [Śay-v_50] teṣu sūtreṣv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti,
V03vinv15_u:101_9: nāham tvā jāne nāpi gṛham; anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv15_u:101_11: dhruvaṃ na māṃ vetti ḥnāpi mama gṛhamḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_12: kim atra prāptakālaṃ bhagavantam ālokayāmi yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca jetavanam atrāntarāt parikramaṇakāṃ kārayāmi iti viditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_13: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_15: āgantukā bhadanta bhikṣava agocarakuśalā piṇḍapātam aṭantaḥ kālātikramatayā kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kurvanti;
V03vinv15_u:101_17: tad yadi bhagavān anujānīyād ahaṃ yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca jetavanaṃ atrāntarāt parikramaṇakāṃ kārayeyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_18: yasya yatra velā bhaviṣyati sa tatra piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyate iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_19: bhagavān āha: tasmād gṛhapate 'nujānāmi kāraya iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_20: tena yāvac ca śrāvastī yāvac ca jetavanam atrāntarāt parikramaṇakā kāritā;
V03vinv15_u:101_21: yatra velā bhavati sa tatra bhaktakṛtyaṃ karoti
V03vinv15_u:101_23: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā tatra kūpaḥ kāritaḥ trikaṭukasya triphalāyāś ca śakaṭabhāra utkṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_25: janakāyaḥ śrutvā āgataḥ; bhikṣavo vārayanti; śrāvastīnivāsinaḥ: āryā vayaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pratyupasthitaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:101_28: bhagavān āha: na nivārayitavyā iti; mātṛgrāmo bhikṣūṇāṃ pānīyaṃ yācate;
V03vinv15_u:101_29: bhikṣavo nānuprayacchanti; [A_330b] bhagavān āha: dātavyam; uktaṃ bhagavatā: mātṛgrāmaṃ samantapāśaṃ mārabandhanam iti;
V03vinv15_u:101_31: yāvad anyatarā strī rūpayauvanasaṃpannā taruṇakasya bhikṣor antike 'tyartham avekṣāvatī [Śay-v_50] tat pānīyaṃ yācate;
V03vinv15_u:101_33: nivāryamāṇo 'py acchinnadhārayā dadāti evaṃ sāpi nirīkṣate,
V03vinv15_u:101_34: pibati, bata pānīyaṃ viṣamam gatam, kālagatā; akpārthā bhikṣavo 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivācayanti;
V03vinv15_u:101_36: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: yā strīr bhikṣor antike avekṣāvatī bhavati pratibaddhacittā bhavati tasyā svayaṃ na dātavyam;
V03vinv15_u:101_37: na ca mātṛgrāmasya acchinnayā dhārayā pānīyaṃ dātavyam;
V03vinv15_u:101_38: antarāntarā vāridhārā cchettavyā vaktavyā vā añjaliṃ pūrayitvā piba iti,
V03vinv15_u:101_39: tena khalu samayena ye 'grapiṇḍapātaṃ jetavane pratipādayanti te tatraiva dātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:101_43: atha pānīyapeyā bhavati, kathayanti: mahardhikaḥ saṃghaḥ, saṃghaḥ sa mahānubhāvaḥ, saṃghāyānuprayacchata, evaṃ khaṇḍakhādyakādi yojayitavyam;
V03vinv15_u:101_46: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: na bhikṣuṇā parakīye lābhe saṃnipatitavyam:
V03vinv15_u:101_47: saṃnipatati, sātisāro bhavati; uktaṃ bhagavatā: na bhikṣuṇā parakīye lābhe saṃnipatitavyam iti
V03vinv15_u:101_49: teṣāṃ tatra gatānāṃ velā āsannā bhavati;
V03vinv15_u:101_50: kaukṛtyān na paribhuñjate; etat prakaraṇam bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti;
V03vinv15_u:101_51: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: saṃcintya na gantavyam anyathā gatānāṃ yadi velā bhavati bhoktavyam,
V03vinv15_u:101_53: sakṛcchraḥ kālo vartate; bhikṣavo vihārāntaraṃ gatāḥ; te tatra bhikṣūn bhuñjānāṃ dṛṣṭvā punar ākāṃkṣante bhoktum;
V03vinv15_u:101_56: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha; yan na gṛhītaṃ pūrvavihāre tac ced aparimitaṃ cāryate grahītavyam;
V03vinv15_u:101_57: atha bhikṣuprāmāṇyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati na grahītavyam;

V03vinv15_u:104_0: atha bhagavān kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikān caran kiṭāgirim anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:104_1: tena khalu samayena kiṭāgirāv aśvakapunarvasukau bhikṣū prativasataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:104_2: tābhyāṃ śrutaṃ: bhagavān kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritvā ihāgamiṣyati sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti;
V03vinv15_u:104_4: bhikṣavo 'smān śāstuḥ saṃnidhau codayiṣyanti ḥsmārayiṣyantiḥ alajjitena vā vaitarikeṇa vā;
V03vinv15_u:104_5: yan nu vayaṃ bhagavato 'rthāya mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bhikṣūn ārabhya trīn śayanāsanoddeśakān kārayema,
V03vinv15_u:104_6: ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakān; trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśalāḥ katame? haimantiko graiṣmiko [A_331a] varṣikaś ca;
V03vinv15_u:104_7: ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrahakāḥ katame? sarvo vihāra uddeṣṭavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:104_8: sarvo vihārasāmantakaḥ, sarvaḥ parigaṇaḥ, sarvaḥ parigaṇasāmantakaḥ, sarva ārāmaḥ sarvaḥ ārāmasāmantakaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:104_9: yadi kathayanti vihāram uddiśateti vaktavyā uddiṣṭo 'yam;
V03vinv15_u:104_14: te alayanā apratiṣṭhitā nāsmān codayiṣyanti smārayiṣyanti alajjitena vā vaitarikeṇa vā;
V03vinv15_u:104_16: ṣāṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ; [Śay-v_53] yāvad bhagavān kiṭāgirim anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:104_18: bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti: āyuṣmantau śayanāsanam uddiśatāṃ vihāraṃ ca;
V03vinv15_u:104_19_0: kathayataḥ: pūrvoddiṣṭako vihāraḥ; parigaṇam uddiṣata; so 'py uddiṣṭaḥ; vihārasāmantakam uddiśata; so 'py uddiṣṭaḥ; parigaṇasāmantakam
V03vinv15_u:104_19_1: uddiśata; so 'py uddiṣṭakaḥ; ārāmam uddiśata; so 'py uddiṣṭakaḥ; ārāmasāmantakam uddiśata; so 'py uddiṣṭakaḥ; yatas tau sarvāvasthau
V03vinv15_u:104_20: jānakā pṛcchakā buddhā bhagavanto jānantaḥ pṛcchanti,
V03vinv15_u:104_21: ajānanto na pṛcchanti; kāle pṛcchanti; kālātikrāntaṃ na pṛcchanti, arthopasaṃhitaṃ pṛcchanti, anarthopasaṃhitaṃ na pṛcchanti,
V03vinv15_u:104_23: tatra kālajñā buddhā bhagavantaḥ arthopasaṃhitāyāṃ pṛcchāyām;
V03vinv15_u:104_25: kim eṣa ānanda ante ārāmasya uccaśabdo mahāśabdo jātaḥ mahājanakāyasya ca nirghoṣaḥ? sa kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:104_26: aśvakapunarvasukābhyām ḥbhikṣūbhyāṃḥ bhikṣūn ārabhyā trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ kṛtāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:104_27: ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ; bhikṣavaḥ śayanāsanaṃ na labhante;
V03vinv15_u:104_28: tenāyam ante ārāmasya uccaśabdo mahāśabdo mahājanakāyasya ca nirghoṣaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:104_29: bhagavān āha: kalahakārakān ānanda mayā bhikṣūn saṃdhāya trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ kṛtāḥ,
V03vinv15_u:104_30: no 'tra prakṛtisthakānām; tasmān na bhikṣubhiḥ prakṛtisthakān bhikṣūn ārabhya trayaḥ śayanāsanoddeśakāḥ kartavyāḥ ṣaṭ śayanāsanagrāhakāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:106_0: The mischief of the Six Monks again
V03vinv15_u:107_0: bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikān caran anyatarasmin agrāmake 'raṇyāyatane rātrivāsam upagataḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv15_u:107_1: ṣaḍvargikair bhagavato 'rthāya ekaṃ śobhanavṛkṣaṃ sthāpayitvā [Śay-v_54] anye śobhanavṛkṣā ātmanā gṛhītāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_5: sa bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sthavirasthavirān paryeṣate;
V03vinv15_u:107_6: yāvat paśyati ṣaḍvargikān śobhaneṣu vṛkṣesv avasthāpitān;
V03vinv15_u:107_8: sa hum iti kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_9: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_10: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kośalo [A_331b] bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:107_11: aham asmi bhadanta rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sarvaviṣayodbhavānāṃ ratnānām;
V03vinv15_u:107_13: ḥyadḥ avaśiṣṭam yathārhaṃ tad devīnāṃ kumārāṇām amātyānām baṭabalāgrasya;
V03vinv15_u:107_17: aho bata bhagavān vṛkṣān api yathāvṛddhikayā prajñapayed anukampām ādāya iti;
V03vinv15_u:107_18: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv15_u:107_19: atha rājā prasenajit kośalo bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsnāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_20: asyām utpattau bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo vṛkṣā api yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyā sthaṇḍilāny api śādvalāny api iti;
V03vinv15_u:107_21: uktaṃ bhagavatā: vṛkṣā api yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyā sthaṇḍilāni śādvalāny api iti
V03vinv15_u:107_22: bhikṣavaḥ svayam evoddiśanti; bhagavān āha: vihāroddeśako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_24: bhagavān āha: pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato vihāroddeśako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:107_25: saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ; katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? chandād gacchati dveṣān mohād bhayād gacchati uddiṣṭānuddiṣṭavihāraṃ na jānāti;
V03vinv15_u:107_26: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ vihāroddeśako 'saṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:107_27: saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ; [Śay-v_54] pañcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgato vihāroddeśakaḥ asaṃmataḥ saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:107_29: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na chandād gacchati na dveṣān na bhayān na mohād gacchati uddiṣṭānudhiṣṭaṃ ca jānāti;
V03vinv15_u:107_30: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato vihāroddeśakaḥ asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:107_32: evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite pūrvavad yāvad utsāhayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_33: utsahase tvam evaṃnāmā saṃghasya vihārān uddeṣṭum iti;
V03vinv15_u:107_34: saced utsahate ḥtena vaktavyam utsahe iti;
V03vinv15_u:107_35: tataḥ paścādḥ ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam;
V03vinv15_u:107_36: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ, ayaṃ evaṃnāmā vihāroddeśako bhikṣur utsahate saṃghasya vihārān uddeṣṭum;
V03vinv15_u:107_38: anujānīyaṭ saṃgho yat saṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ vihāroddeśakam saṃmanyeta ity eṣā jñāptiḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_39: karma kartavyam; śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ, ayam evaṃnāmā vihāroddeśako bhikṣuḥ utsahate saṃghasya vihārān uddeṣṭum tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ vihāroddeśakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmanyate;
V03vinv15_u:107_40: yeṣām āyuṣmatām kṣamate evaṃnāmānaṃ vihāroddeśakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmantum tet tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv15_u:107_41: na kṣamate, bhāṣantā; saṃmataḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmā vihāroddeśako bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv15_u:107_43_0: evam etad dhārayāmi; yathā vihāroddeśakaḥ evaṃ bhaktoddeśakaḥ yavāgūcāradaḥ khādyakabhājakaḥ yatkiṃciccārakaḥ bhāṇḍagopakaḥ
V03vinv15_u:107_44: pañcabhir [Śay-v_56] dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ prāsādavāriko bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:107_45: ḥsaṃmntaś cāvakāśayitavyaḥḥ; katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? chandād gacchati dveṣān mohād bhayād gacchati,
V03vinv15_u:107_47: pañcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ prāsādavāriko bhikṣur asaṃmata saṃmantavyaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:107_48: saṃmataś cānavakāśayitavyaḥ; katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na chandād gacchati,
